attributes.action: Make public sexual harrassment a criminal offense.
attributes.additional_details: Over 97% of women over the age of 14 have been sexually harrased. This is nearly all of the women in the UK. Enough is enough, action must be taken since sexual harrassment has put many people in danger.
attributes.background: Sexual harrassment should become a criminal offense in the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for all sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577443

Make sexual harassment a specific criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940
